sentence.Network_en: The dog, an ungainly mongrel pup, was loping about the road.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只丑陋的杂种幼犬在马路上到处乱跑。

sentence.Network_en: Paul swam in his ungainly way to the side of the pool.
sentence.Network_cn: 保罗笨拙地游到池子边。

sentence.Network_en: He was a tall, ungainly boy of 18.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个个子高而笨拙的18岁小伙子。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以u开头的英语英文单词 ... unfurl 打开，展开 ungainly 笨拙的，不雅的 unguent 药膏，软膏.
ungainliness 丑陋ungainly 丑陋的ungenerous 胸襟狭窄的
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... unfold 展开，打开 ungainly 笨拙的，难看的 uniform 不变的，一贯的 n.制服.
On land the turtle be ungainly , but In the water It Isvery agile ., 龟在陆地上行动笨拙 , 在水里则很灵活.

list.abs: It is often an ungainly , comic endeavour ., 那往往是一种笨拙可笑的尝试.
the ungainly movements of ducks out of water ., 鸭子出水的笨拙动作.
Not so long ago , this ungainly partnership was faring poorly ., 不久以前 , 这一笨拙的伙伴关系颇不走运.
turned outward in an ungainly manner ., 以难看的样子向外翻转.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from un- 'not' + obsolete gainly 'graceful', based on Old Norse gegn 'straight'

entry.def: If you describe a person, animal, or vehicle as ungainly, you mean that they look awkward or clumsy, often because they are big.

example.ex: The dog, an ungainly mongrel pup, was loping about the road...
example.tran: 那只丑陋的杂种幼犬在马路上到处乱跑。

example.ex: Paul swam in his ungainly way to the side of the pool.
example.tran: 保罗笨拙地游到池子边。

means.word_mean: 1. lacking grace in movement or posture;

sentences.sentence: "a gawky lad with long ungainly legs"
"what an ungainly creature a giraffe is"
"heaved his unwieldy figure out of his chair"

means.word_mean: 2. difficult to handle or manage especially because of shape;

sentences.sentence: "the cello, a rather ungainly instrument for a girl"

auth_sentence.content: He was an odd-looking personage with an ungainly figure.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was an odd-looking personage with an ungainly figure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was an odd-looking personage with an ungainly figure.

auth_sentence.content: But Spacey made the impossible probable and the ungainly riveting.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Spacey made the impossible probable and the ungainly riveting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Spacey made the impossible probable and the ungainly riveting.

auth_sentence.content: She drove them along in an ungainly but decided way.
auth_sentence.res_content: She drove them along in an ungainly but decided way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She drove them along in an ungainly but decided way.

means.word_mean: 难看的；不雅的；别扭的,笨拙的

sentences.en: I thought him terribly ungainly when he danced.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他跳舞时显得极其笨拙。
